case.title: Genuine Sugar Daddy seeks Sugar Baby for ongoing relationship - 38 (London)
case.text:
Hi
Thanks for reading.
I am a British white male in my late 30's seeking a girl aged 18+ who wants a Sugar Daddy.
I am not looking to be financial slave.
I am looking to be a sugar daddy with a nice girl.
If interested write and tell me about yourself and ideally attach some pictures
x
